title: Add Advanced Resume Builder Module with 14 Templates

requirements.text: Create ResumeBuilderPage component at /resume-builder route displaying 14 resume templates organized in two categories: Indian Format (Fresher Resume, Government Job Resume, Private Job Resume, Hindi Resume, Biodata for Marriage, Teacher Resume, Police/Army Resume) and International Format (ATS Friendly Resume, US Resume, UK CV Format, Canada Resume, Europass CV, Creative Resume, Corporate Resume)

quotes: Add two main categories: 1️⃣ INDIAN FORMAT: • Fresher Resume • Government Job Resume • Private Job Resume • Hindi Resume • Biodata for Marriage • Teacher Resume • Police / Army Resume 2️⃣ INTERNATIONAL FORMAT: • ATS Friendly Resume • US Resume • UK CV Format • Canada Resume • Europass CV • Creative Resume • Corporate Resume

acceptanceCriteria: ResumeBuilderPage component exists at frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx
Route /resume-builder is configured in App.tsx
Page displays two distinct category sections: Indian Format and International Format
Each category shows 7 template cards with names matching the specification exactly
Template cards are clickable and lead to individual template builders

requirements.text: Implement multi-step form wizard with progressive sections including Personal Info (name, email, phone, address, LinkedIn, portfolio), Education (degree, institution, year, grade), Experience (company, role, duration, responsibilities), Skills (technical, soft skills), Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, and References with ability to add/remove individual entries within each section
acceptanceCriteria: Form wizard component displays step indicators showing current progress
Each section (Personal Info, Education, Experience, Skills, Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, References) has dedicated form fields
Users can add multiple entries for Education, Experience, Skills, Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, References
Each repeatable section has Add and Remove buttons
Form validates required fields before allowing progression to next step
Navigation between steps works via Next/Previous buttons

requirements.text: Create live preview component that renders resume in real-time as user fills form fields, updating instantly without page reload and displaying exactly how the final PDF will appear with proper formatting, spacing, and typography matching the selected template
acceptanceCriteria: Preview pane displays side-by-side with form on desktop layouts
Preview updates in real-time as user types or modifies any field
Preview shows exact layout and styling that will appear in downloaded PDF
Preview is scrollable and maintains A4 aspect ratio
All template-specific formatting rules are applied in preview

requirements.text: Add optional photo upload feature with drag-and-drop support, image crop/resize preview, and template-aware placement logic where Indian format templates (Fresher, Government Job, Private Job, Hindi, Biodata, Teacher, Police/Army) show photo prominently while International format templates (ATS, US, UK, Canada, Europass, Creative, Corporate) hide photo by default or place it minimally
acceptanceCriteria: Photo upload section supports drag-and-drop and click-to-upload
Uploaded image displays in crop/resize preview with aspect ratio controls
Indian format templates display uploaded photo in header or sidebar
International format templates either hide photo or show it minimally based on template design
Photo can be removed after upload

requirements.text: Implement custom color theme selector with at least 6 predefined color palettes (Professional Blue, Corporate Black, Creative Purple, Modern Teal, Classic Gray, Elegant Maroon) that dynamically apply to resume headers, section borders, accent lines, and text highlights without affecting readability
acceptanceCriteria: Color theme selector displays 6+ color palette options
Selecting a color palette instantly updates preview with new colors
Colors apply to headers, borders, section dividers, and accent elements
Text remains readable with proper contrast ratios
Selected theme persists when downloading PDF

requirements.text: Create auto-formatting logic that converts Skills section entries into bullet points, auto-formats dates to MM/YYYY format, formats phone numbers to Indian (+91) or International format based on selected template category, capitalizes proper nouns, and ensures consistent spacing throughout the resume
acceptanceCriteria: Skills entries automatically convert to bullet point format
Date inputs auto-format to MM/YYYY pattern
Phone numbers format to +91-XXXXX-XXXXX for Indian templates
Phone numbers format to international standard for International templates
Proper nouns in name fields auto-capitalize first letters
Consistent line spacing and margins apply across all sections

requirements.text: Implement PDF download functionality with proper A4 page sizing (210mm x 297mm), intelligent page breaks that avoid splitting sections mid-content, embedded fonts to ensure consistent rendering across devices, and template-specific styling preserved using client-side PDF generation library (jsPDF or similar)
acceptanceCriteria: Download PDF button generates PDF file with user's resume data
PDF uses A4 page dimensions (210mm x 297mm)
Page breaks intelligently avoid splitting sections or list items
Fonts are embedded in PDF for consistent cross-platform rendering
Downloaded PDF exactly matches live preview styling
PDF filename includes template name and timestamp

requirements.text: Add basic AI summary generator using local logic (no external API calls) that analyzes user's experience entries and skills to generate 2-3 sentence professional summary focusing on years of experience, key skills, notable achievements, and career objectives using action-oriented language and industry-standard phrasing

quotes: • Basic AI summary generator (local logic, no paid API)

acceptanceCriteria: AI Summary Generator button appears in Personal Info section
Generator analyzes filled experience and skills data locally
Generated summary is 2-3 sentences with professional tone
Summary includes quantifiable experience (years) and key skills
Summary uses action words and achievement-focused language
No external API calls are made during generation
User can edit generated summary after creation

requirements.text: Create individual SEO-friendly pages for each of the 14 resume templates at routes /resume-builder/[template-slug] with unique meta titles following pattern '[Template Name] Resume Builder - Free Online Tool | Document Master Tools', descriptions highlighting template-specific benefits, Open Graph tags, FAQ sections answering common questions about each template format, and internal links to Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools
acceptanceCriteria: Each of 14 templates has individual route at /resume-builder/[template-slug]
SEO component is integrated with unique title for each template
Meta descriptions are 150-160 characters highlighting template benefits
Open Graph tags include og:title, og:description, og:image
FAQ section with 3-5 questions specific to each template format
Internal links to Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools are present
BreadcrumbNavigation component shows Home > Resume Builder > [Template Name]

requirements.text: Ensure all Resume Builder components including main hub page, template selection, form wizard, live preview, and individual template pages are fully mobile responsive with vertical form layout on screens below 768px, collapsible sections on mobile, touch-friendly input controls, preview positioned below form on mobile, and proper scaling from 320px width upward
acceptanceCriteria: Resume Builder hub displays template grid in 1 column on mobile (<768px)
Form wizard uses vertical layout on mobile with collapsible sections
All input fields are touch-friendly with appropriate sizing
Live preview appears below form on mobile devices
Preview scales properly for mobile viewport widths
Navigation and buttons are easily tappable on touch devices
Layout remains functional and usable on 320px width screens

requirements.text: Style Resume Builder with modern clean UI matching existing Tailwind design system using card-based layout for form sections, smooth transitions for step navigation, progress indicator showing completion percentage, optional save draft functionality storing data in localStorage, clear primary call-to-action buttons (Next, Download PDF), and consistent spacing aligned with Calculator, PDF, and Image Tools styling
acceptanceCriteria: Form sections use card-based layout with rounded corners and shadows
Step transitions have smooth fade or slide animations
Progress indicator displays percentage completion
Save Draft button stores form data to localStorage
Primary action buttons (Next, Download PDF) use consistent brand colors
Spacing and typography match existing tool pages
Color scheme follows Tailwind configuration with light/dark mode support

requirements.text: Update HomePage to add Resume Builder section alongside existing Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools sections, displaying both template categories (Indian Format: 7 templates, International Format: 7 templates) with representative preview cards showing template names, brief descriptions, and call-to-action buttons linking to /resume-builder
acceptanceCriteria: HomePage includes Resume Builder section after existing tool sections
Section header displays total count (14 Resume Templates)
Two category cards show Indian Format (7) and International Format (7)
Each category card has icon, description, and View Templates button
Cards link to /resume-builder with smooth scroll or navigation
Section styling matches existing Calculator, PDF, and Image Tools sections

requirements.text: Update Header component navigation to include Resume Builder link that directs users to /resume-builder, positioned after Calculator Hub link and maintaining consistent navigation styling with other header links
acceptanceCriteria: Header component includes Resume Builder navigation link
Link positioned logically in navigation order
Link styling matches other header navigation items
Link is responsive and displays properly on mobile menu
Clicking link navigates to /resume-builder route

requirements.text: Integrate AdPlaceholder components into Resume Builder pages with top banner ad (728×90) after H1 heading, in-content ad (300×250) positioned between form wizard and preview sections on desktop, and sidebar ad (160×600) in right sidebar layout when viewport width exceeds 1024px, ensuring ads do not interfere with form functionality or preview visibility
acceptanceCriteria: Top banner AdPlaceholder appears after H1 on all Resume Builder pages
In-content AdPlaceholder positioned between form and preview on desktop
Sidebar AdPlaceholder displays in right column on viewports >1024px
Ads use aspect ratio boxes to prevent layout shift
Ads do not obscure form inputs or preview content
Ad containers are marked with 'Advertisement' label

requirements.text: Update App.tsx routing to include /resume-builder main route displaying ResumeBuilderPage and individual routes for all 14 resume templates following pattern /resume-builder/[template-slug] where slugs are: fresher-resume, government-job-resume, private-job-resume, hindi-resume, biodata-for-marriage, teacher-resume, police-army-resume, ats-friendly-resume, us-resume, uk-cv-format, canada-resume, europass-cv, creative-resume, corporate-resume
acceptanceCriteria: Route /resume-builder is configured in App.tsx
All 14 individual template routes are configured with correct slugs
Each template route renders appropriate template builder component
Routes follow consistent naming pattern with hyphens
Navigation between hub and individual templates works correctly

constraints: Do NOT rebuild full application or modify existing calculator, PDF, or image tool logic
Do NOT use external paid APIs for AI summary generation; use local logic only
Do NOT change backend architecture; all resume building happens client-side
Do NOT modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Footer must display: © 2026 RJY TOTAL MANPOWERS SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED. All Rights Reserved.
Resume Builder must use existing Tailwind design system and color variables
nonGoals: Backend resume storage or database integration
User accounts or authentication for saving resumes
External AI API integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Integration with job boards or ATS systems
